section.para: To update Prices by Product Category, select the "Update Prices by Product Category" option. The following screen will appear:
When updating Prices by Product Category, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to update Prices for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose Prices you want to update.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Enter an amount based on the Price update option you specify:
Select to update Prices by a percentage amount.
Select to update Prices by a fixed amount.
Select to also update Prices associated with Item Characteristics for Items in the specified Product Category range.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without updating Prices by Product Category, returning you to the application desktop.
Updates Prices by Product Category, using the specified parameters.
